articles.author: Don Reisinger
articles.title: Growing coronavirus threat weighs on Apple
articles.description: Apple's week was dominated by COVID-19 and its impact on WWDC, along with reports of new iPads, iPhones, and Macs.

articles.author: John Buysse
articles.title: Fact checking Trump’s claims on the coronavirus outbreak—and its impact on the economy
articles.description: A sampling of Trump's rhetoric on the virus—and how it compares with the facts.

articles.author: reymashayekhi
articles.title: Global selloff continues as coronavirus batters markets
articles.description: Investors will be happy to see the end of the week, as markets globally took a pounding again on Friday.

articles.author: John Buysse
articles.title: Facebook bans ads for medical face masks amid coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: Facebook is temporarily banning advertisements for medical face masks as part of an effort to prevent use of its platform to exploit people's concerns about the new coronavirus.

articles.author: Jenna Schnuer
articles.title: Fear of coronavirus sends consumers into a grocery-hoarding frenzy
articles.description: “This is my way of exerting control of the uncertainty of the current situation," said one man of his emergency grocery supplies (which included 12 cans of chili beans and soap).

articles.author: John Buysse
articles.title: Coronavirus: Fewer than 6,000 samples have been tested in the U.S.
